verses.verse: Again it happened on the day <S%H3117><s%> when the God <S%H430><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to present <S%H3320><s%> themselves before Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> that Satan <S%H7854><s%> came <S%H935><s%> also among <S%H8432><s%> them to present <S%H3320><s%> himself before Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Satan, <S%H7854><s%> "Where <S%H335><s%> have you come <S%H935><s%> from? <S%H7854><s%>" Satan answered <S%H6030><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H6030><s%> "From going back and forth <S%H7751><s%> in the earth, <S%H776><s%> and from walking up and down in it. <S%H1980><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Satan, <S%H7854><s%> "Have you <S%H7760><s%> considered <S%H3820><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> Job? <S%H347><s%> For there is none like him in the earth, <S%H776><s%> a blameless <S%H8535><s%> and an upright <S%H3477><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> one who fears <S%H3373><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and turns <S%H5493><s%> away from evil. <S%H7451><s%> He still maintains <S%H2388><s%> his integrity, <S%H8538><s%> although you incited <S%H5496><s%> me against him, <S%H1104><s%> to ruin him without cause. <S%H2600><s%>"

Satan <S%H7854><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H6030><s%> "Skin <S%H5785><s%> for skin. <S%H5785><s%> Yes, <S%H376><s%> all that a man has he will give <S%H5414><s%> for his life. <S%H5315><s%>

But <S%H199><s%> put forth <S%H7971><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> now, <S%H5060><s%> and touch his bone <S%H6106><s%> and his flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and he will renounce <S%H1288><s%> you to your face. <S%H6440><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Satan, <S%H7854><s%> "Behold, <S%H3027><s%> he is in your hand. Only spare <S%H8104><s%> his life. <S%H5315><s%>"

So Satan <S%H7854><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> Job <S%H347><s%> with painful <S%H7451><s%> sores <S%H7822><s%> from the sole <S%H3709><s%> of his foot <S%H7272><s%> to his head. <S%H6936><s%>
He took <S%H3947><s%> for himself a potsherd <S%H2789><s%> to scrape <S%H1623><s%> himself with, <S%H3427><s%> and he sat among <S%H8432><s%> the ashes. <S%H665><s%>
Then his wife <S%H802><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H2388><s%> "Do you still maintain your integrity? <S%H8538><s%> Renounce <S%H1288><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and die. <S%H4191><s%>"

But he said <S%H559><s%> to her, <S%H1696><s%> "You speak as one <S%H259><s%> of the foolish women <S%H5036><s%> would speak. <S%H1696><s%> What? <S%H1571><s%> Shall we receive <S%H6901><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> at the hand of God, <S%H430><s%> and shall we not receive <S%H6901><s%> evil? <S%H7451><s%>" In all this Job <S%H347><s%> didn't <S%H2398><s%> sin with his lips. <S%H8193><s%>

Now when Job <S%H347><s%>'s three <S%H7969><s%> friends <S%H7453><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of all this evil <S%H7451><s%> that had come <S%H935><s%> on him, <S%H376><s%> they each came <S%H935><s%> from his own place: <S%H4725><s%> Eliphaz <S%H464><s%> the Temanite, <S%H8489><s%> Bildad <S%H1085><s%> the Shuhite, <S%H7747><s%> and Zophar <S%H6691><s%> the Naamathite, <S%H5284><s%> and they made an appointment <S%H3259><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> to sympathize <S%H5110><s%> with him and to comfort him. <S%H5162><s%>

When they lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%> from a distance, <S%H7350><s%> and didn't <S%H5234><s%> recognize him, <S%H5375><s%> they raised their voices, <S%H6963><s%> and wept; <S%H1058><s%> and they each <S%H376><s%> tore <S%H7167><s%> his robe, <S%H4598><s%> and sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> dust <S%H6083><s%> on their heads <S%H7218><s%> toward the sky. <S%H8064><s%>

So they sat down <S%H3427><s%> with him on the ground <S%H776><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> nights, <S%H3915><s%> and none spoke <S%H1696><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> to him, <S%H7200><s%> for they saw that his grief <S%H3511><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> great. <S%H1431><s%>
